text: Like I said before you shouldn’t call this API from your website as it will expose your API key to the world. Someone could use this key to make changes in your HubSpot account and expose your data
Hey, I'm getting a 403 forbidden when I try to access the developer docs
Hey there, can you try hard refreshing?(ctrl/cmd+shift+r)

Hi everyone!
We’re ending the development phase for a client and the IT team just informed us that they’d like to perform a pentest on the website (still in sandbox). Anyone who has already covered this topic who would be willing to answer our questions? (not so many, I promise!)
yea, that temporarily works (so does clearing cache) but then it eventually starts doing it again
did I do something to anger the cloudflare gods?

hmmm, thank you for following up.

I’ll DM you.
Hey Emeline, please review and also send this link to your IT team. <https://www.HubSpot.com/security>
Hi Jon, thanks for the link!
Hello there! I had a few questions. Is there a link for free tiers for the various tools offered by HubSpot?

Yep. <https://www.HubSpot.com/pricing/crm>

If you have questions about what’s available in specific tiers or other pricing related questions  the little chat widget that pops up is a great place to ask.
